titleStmt.title: A short narrative by way of vindication of the late honourable Marquesse of Montrosse, his last designe, impartially setting forth the true grounds which moved him to undertake that second imployment, together with the most probable causes of his miscarriage therein.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: University of Toronto. Library.
